DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Gathering information symptom management patient localized prostate cancer may help doctor improve patient ' quality life . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study symptom management African-American men localize prostate cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Symptom Management African-American Men With Localized Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Develop symptom management intervention African-American men treat localized prostate cancer , particular emphasis low health literacy men . OUTLINE : Participants interview principal investigator phone meet principal investigator Veterans Administration prostate cancer clinic . If interview conduct clinic , hold private room clinic .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Biopsyproven localize prostate cancer Has receive treatment prostate cancer Patient selfidentifies AfricanAmerican descent PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Able speak read English Has address order receive study material mail ( street address post office box ) Has either telephone order interview OR able meet principal investigator Veterans Administration prostate clinic interview PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : See Disease Characteristics
